source_sentence: 呵鵰(上壑歌反下鳥聊反經名也錄或作荷鵰未詳熟是)。
translation: (Skt. hawk (Skt. gugal, Skt. tori) is also the name of a scripture recorded as hawk, but not fully understood.)

source_sentence: 木槵(下還慣反經名也)。
translation: (Skt. mucilinda) (also known as the sutra name for the lower half of the letter 'kuṅkuma').

source_sentence: 郁迦(上氳菊反毛詩傳作彧或茂盛貌也說文作郁字孔注論語云文章[佫-口+用]也長者名也錄作郁時通用也)。
translation: Ugra (Up śukku (Up śukku), Mao Shichuan (Mao Shichuan), Yu or luxuriant appearance, Shuowen (Shuowen), Ugra (Kong), Analects, and Wenwen (He - mouth + use), also the name of the elder, recorded as Ugra.

source_sentence: 一切經音義卷第八十
translation: Yiqie jing yinyi roll eightieth
